short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension for all of your timer and stopwatch needs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple and easy to use Timer and Stopwatch! Have it in your browser and you can always access it with one click! Open the timer and stopwatch on a separate tab whenever you want!
